mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info (user_login_type, user_email, user_password, user_nickname, user_birthday, user_phone, user_invitation_code, user_phone_verified, user_agreed_privacy, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userLoginType}, #{userEmail}, #{userPassword}, #{userNickname}, #{userBirthday}, #{userPhone}, #{userInvitationCode}, #{userPhoneVerified}, #{userAgreedPrivacy}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user_info WHERE user_email = #{userEmail} AND is_deleted = false
mapper.update: UPDATE user_info SET user_nickname = #{userNickname}, user_agreed_privacy = #{userAgreedPrivacy}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE user_email = #{userEmail}
